segments.text: Could you tell me what university you went to , Mr . Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you ? And what did you study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a B . A . in Economics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you mind telling me how old you are ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And could you tell me what other jobs you have had ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have worked in a bank for the last years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what was your salary at the bank ?
segments.speaker: S1
